data.message: Drill 2: Card Systems x30 - Created 30 card variations across 5 categories (Profile, Product, Article, Dashboard, Pricing): Completed all 30 cards in Pencil. Explored styles: Glassmorphism, Neubrutalism, Soft UI, Editorial, Dark Luxury, Minimal. Top scorers: A6 Editorial (30/30), D2 Chart Card (29/30), P4 Enterprise (29/30). Documented 8 card grammar patterns. Key insight: Editorial cards score highest when they commit to bold typography and whitespace.
